txt.en: Now that you have been entered into the pit-fighting tournament, you should show these Orcs what you can do!

'Oh no, Párgrub ruined. Bet against you every time. Thought you would die a horrible death, Párgrub did. Now you win every fight and Párgrub have nothing. Such failure.\n\n'At least other Orcs think you work for Párgrub now. Maybe you come back and fight again sometime and this poor snaga will bet on you for once!'
'Now it's the last fight. Párgrub has only one chance left to bet big. All this poor snaga's supplies but the bucket of armour scrap will go! You will, err, win for me, yes?'
Párgrub can be found near Thorzhaf.\n\nYou should speak with Párgrub about the match.
'This is it! Are you ready, strong [placeholder]?'
